articles.description: Alpine junior Oscar Piastri completed a historic hat-trick of titles in the first Formula 2 Sprint Race in Abu Dhabi, charging from 10th to third to seal the F2 crown with a podium and add it to a collection that also includes the 2020 Formula 3 Championship …

articles.title: Monank Patel handed USA ODI captaincy | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The first-time inclusions of teenage sensation Rahul Jariwala (ODIs only), Vatsal Vaghela and Marty Kain headlined the squad announcement for the series against Ireland
articles.content:
